PROJECT.NAME: qmNipGamm
PROJECT.TITLE: Niphargus gammariformis, genomic and transcriptomic data.
PROJECT.DESCRIPTION: This project collects the genomic and transcriptomic data generated for Niphargus gammariformis to facilitate genome assembly and annotation as part of the Biodiversity Genomics Europe project (BGE, https://biodiversitygenomics.eu/) and organised by the European Reference Genome Atlas (ERGA, https://www.erga-biodiversity.eu/) initiative.

PROJECT.NAME: qmNipGamm10
PROJECT.TITLE: Niphargus gammariformis, genome assembly, qmNipGamm10.
PROJECT.DESCRIPTION: This project provides the genome assembly of Niphargus gammariformis. The assembly is provided by the European Reference Genome Atlas (ERGA, https://www.erga-biodiversity.eu/) via the Biodiversity Genomics Europe project (BGE, https://biodiversitygenomics.eu/).
